review: Waste of your money.I bought it when i really needed a rook. my family has Roku 3 in living room and i needed one in my room TV. I thought this wireless one will work fine.IT KEEPS DISCONNECTING FROM WIRELESS ALL THE TIME. I hate it when it happens in the middle of a movie on Netflix. I keep rebooting, as the roku help suggest, but over and over again, it fails to stay connected.The sucking part is that when i go in settings to check my network connectivity, it shows "Excellent connection" but never can stream anything.my laptop uses the same wifi, my phone uses wifi in-house, they are always connected, no disruption.IF YOU WANT A ROKU, BUY THE STREAMING VERSION WITH ETHERNET CABLE, INSTEAD OF WIRELESS. Rook needs to step up their wireless game.Note: I don't usually do reviews, I do them when i extremely satisfied or extremely UNHAPPY with a product.
